original_text: the king said to Nathan the prophet, “See now, I dwell in a house of cedar, but the ark of God dwells in a tent.”
korean_text: 왕이 선지자 나단에게 이르되 볼지어다 나는 백향목 궁에 살거늘 하나님의 궤는 휘장 가운데에 있도다

sentences.original_text: the king said to Nathan the prophet,
I dwell in a house of cedar,
but the ark of God dwells in a tent.”
